thread.title: Ground News - 'Complete water loss' for flood-hit area sparks emergency alert
thread.title_full: Ground News - 'Complete water loss' for flood-hit area sparks emergency alert

author: 9News
title: Ground News - 'Complete water loss' for flood-hit area sparks emergency alert
text:
Summary by 9News Authorities believe flood-hit towns north of Cairns have lost access to running water, sparking a late-night emergency alert.Just after 10.30pm (11.30pm AEDT) yesterday, firefighters shared an emergency alert warning residents in Port Douglas, Mossman, Newell Beach, and Cooya Beach to conserve water for all but essential uses.Less than an hour later, Douglas Shire Council told the whole area, which is about 60 kilometres north of Cairns and one … Share menu More
